name: Arvidsjaur
description:
Welcome to the Apocalypse

During christmas time, i were in the northen parts of Sweden and during the winter, Norrland, as we say it, is a winter wonderland with snow, coldness and beautiful environment which has inspired me for so long.
Arvidsjaur is a small town in Norrland and i thought to make a zombie apocalypse game set in the chilling winter. It became this game.
I worked on it for about 1 week on my laptop and forgot to post it, until now.

The game was supposed to have a bigger "playarea" with different zones and enemies, but due to limited time and other reasons, i scraped those ideas and it became this which is not to bad to be honest.

You are a human, trapped in the apocalypse. You have weapons already, but you need to find ammo and food. Luckily, there are cabins scattered around the area you can loot from.
You can even find other humans (npc's) that wanders the wasteland and killing zombies as well, however, if the humans die, the turn into undeads as well.
The environment is generated randomly.

The goal is to survive for as long as possible. Good luck!
